parameters.jsCode:
// Sample provider communication data
const communications = [
  {
    communicationId: "COMM-001",
    type: "referral",
    fromProvider: "Dr. Sarah Williams",
    toProvider: "Dr. Michael Chen",
    patientName: "Robert Johnson",
    patientSSN: "123-45-6789",
    patientDOB: "1975-03-15",
    patientPhone: "(617) 555-0123",
    patientEmail: "robert.johnson@email.com",
    patientAddress: "123 Oak Street, Boston, MA 02101",
    insuranceNumber: "BC123456789",
    medicalRecordNumber: "MRN-789456123",
    message: "Patient Robert Johnson (DOB: 1975-03-15) presents with chest pain and elevated blood pressure. SSN: 123-45-6789. Please evaluate for cardiac issues. Contact at (617) 555-0123 or robert.johnson@email.com.",
    priority: "urgent",
    timestamp: "2024-01-15T14:30:00Z",
    attachments: [
      "ECG_Results_2024-01-15.pdf",
      "Lab_Results_2024-01-15.pdf"
    ]
  },
  {
    communicationId: "COMM-002",
    type: "consultation",
    fromProvider: "Dr. Jennifer Lee",
    toProvider: "Dr. David Kim",
    patientName: "Maria Garcia",
    patientSSN: "987-65-4321",
    patientDOB: "1982-08-22",
    patientPhone: "(323) 555-0456",
    patientEmail: "maria.garcia@email.com",
    patientAddress: "456 Pine Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90210",
    insuranceNumber: "AET987654321",
    medicalRecordNumber: "MRN-456789123",
    message: "Consultation request for Maria Garcia (DOB: 1982-08-22). Patient has persistent cough and shortness of breath. SSN: 987-65-4321. Please review imaging studies. Contact: (323) 555-0456.",
    priority: "high",
    timestamp: "2024-01-16T09:15:00Z",
    attachments: [
      "Chest_XRay_2024-01-16.pdf",
      "Pulmonary_Function_Test.pdf"
    ]
  },
  {
    communicationId: "COMM-003",
    type: "insurance_inquiry",
    fromProvider: "Dr. Michael Chen",
    toProvider: "Insurance Coordinator",
    patientName: "David Smith",
    patientSSN: "456-78-9012",
    patientDOB: "1968-12-10",
    patientPhone: "(312) 555-0789",
    patientEmail: "david.smith@email.com",
    patientAddress: "789 Elm Street, Chicago, IL 60601",
    insuranceNumber: "UHC456789123",
    medicalRecordNumber: "MRN-123789456",
    message: "Insurance pre-authorization needed for David Smith (DOB: 1968-12-10). Procedure: Cardiac catheterization. SSN: 456-78-9012. Insurance: UHC456789123. Contact: (312) 555-0789.",
    priority: "medium",
    timestamp: "2024-01-17T11:45:00Z",
    attachments: [
      "Procedure_Authorization_Form.pdf"
    ]
  }
];

// Return each communication as a separate item for processing
return communications.map(comm => ({
  json: comm
}));

parameters.content:
## ðŸ¥ HIPAA PII Processing

**This workflow uses default settings:**
- **`preserveStructure: false`** (default)
- **`includeMetadata: false`** (default)

### What this means:
- **Simple output** - Original data is overwritten with censored data
- **Clean results** - No extra properties, just censored data
- **Easy to use** - Straightforward data structure

### Data Structure:
```json
{
  "patientName": "â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ",   // Censored data
  "patientSSN": "â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ-â–ˆâ–ˆ-â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ",    // Censored data
  "patientEmail": "â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ@â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ.â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ" // Censored data
}
```

**Perfect for:** Healthcare communication, HIPAA compliance, provider data sharing

**Want full audit trails?** Try the Advanced version with both features enabled!
